Body: Possible Duplicate:  Is there any other way to get updates to frozen apps?  I freeze problematic apps in hope of waiting for a better update. When frozen, the apps once did update like normally. I've turned on automatic updates in Google Play Store.Now I've noticed that apps that are frozen does not seem to get updates.Is this a problem with the way I freeze apps? I use Link2SD app to freeze apps.Or is it because of the updated latest versions of Google Play Store doesn't allow updates for the frozen/disabled apps? (Google play store shows "Enable" button over the place of "open/update" for installed frozen apps.)My Google Play Store version: 3.10.10
